articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Stockbreeding Base under Construction
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Stockbreeding Base under Construction
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju of the DPRK made a field survey of stockbreeding base under construction in Sepho area.
					 Going round Phyonggang Meat Processing Factory, Aeguk Cattle Farm and other parts, the premier encouraged the members of the Construction Shock Brigade 922 in successfully building stockbreeding base in Sepho area. 
					
					 A consultative meeting was convened on the spot to discuss the issue of supplying equipment and materials in time needed to finish the project and the measures for running the stockbreeding base on a normal footing such as building the ranks of technicians and skilled workers and raising the rate of mechanization.
					
					 Meanwhile, the premier toured the tree nursery, the fishing tackle factory under construction, other parts of Kangwon Province, calling upon the officials and people in the province to take the lead in the struggle to glorify the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners as befitting the creators of the spirit of Kangwon Province.

articles.title: U.S., Western Countries Are to Blame for World's Biggest Refugee Crisis: DPRK Human Rights Institute
articles.content:
U.S., Western Countries Are to Blame for World's Biggest Refugee Crisis: DPRK Human Rights Institute
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Human Rights Institute of the DPRK Academy of Social Sciences issued a white paper Saturday clarifying the root cause of the world's biggest refugee crisis getting serious day by day on the occasion of June 20, the World Refugees Day.
					 Now that the number of refugees has far exceeded 65 million worldwide, it has become one of the most serious problems faced by the international community in the socio-political and humanitarian fields to tackle this and guarantee their rights, the white paper said, and went on:
					
					 The root cause of the unprecedented refugee crisis today is attributable to the U.S. and other Western countries' foreign policy for aggression and plunder.
					
					 All the foreign policies pursued by the U.S. and the West are based on the imperialist viewpoint of looking down upon other nations and suppressing them while seeking one's own interests only in utter disregard of others, the "logic of strength" guided by jungle law aimed to dominate all countries and nations of the world by force and the dollar-almighty view on value.
					
					 It is due to the U.S. and the West's reactionary external policy that sovereignty of countries are openly violated and extreme political chaos and disorder have been created to cause brutal violation of human rights in different parts of the world.
					
					 The refugee crisis which has thrown humankind into great fear and uneasiness in the new century is an inevitable product of the "war on terrorism" which the U.S. has expanded worldwide by inveigling the Western countries after setting it as one important component of its foreign policy.
					
					 It is clear that the persistent "war on terrorism" characterized by aggression and plunder waged by the U.S. for the world domination will further increase the number of refugees in the targeted countries and regions.
					
					 The occurrence of the unprecedented refugee crisis worldwide today is directly linked with the "coloring revolution" actively pushed forward by the U.S. and the West.
					
					 The "coloring revolution" is one of important foreign policies of the U.S. and the West aimed at bringing all countries and nations under their domination and assimilating them under the signboard of "freedom" and "democracy".
					
					 The reactionary ideological and cultural poisoning and provision of fund to anti-government forces by the U.S. and other Western countries have caused such "coloring revolutions" as "rose revolution", "orange revolution" and "tulip revolution" in several countries of Eastern Europe and Asia as a result of which there have been regime changes in many countries and disputes and civil wars and lots of people have been reduced into refugees.
					
					 Clarifying it is none other than the U.S. and other Western countries that created the biggest refugee crisis and cruelly violate their rights, the white paper continued:
					
					 Even recently the U.S. administration made public an executive order on immigration preventing refugees from entering the U.S. by for 120 days. This executive order is full of discrimination against Muslims from the Mid-east and Africa.
					
					 Not a few African refugees were repatriated in shackles as criminals against their will.
					
					 The Western countries which styled themselves "human rights gentlemen", completely discarding that spurious mask, set up double, treble barbed-wire entanglements in the border areas to block the border. They even set standards for entry, sending back those refugees who do not meet those standards.
					
					 In some countries the refugees are holed up in freight containers when proceedings for entry are underway and a "law" by which those who do not opt for other country are not set free just like criminals is in force.
					
					 Due to the U.S. and other Western countries' sealing of borders and deliberate persecution, large contingents of stranded refugees spend days and months outside in border areas of those countries without the provision of elementary living conditions.
					
					 The U.S. and other Western countries which caused such an inhuman incident and pushed the refugee issue into a grave phase should not evade their responsibilities but face due punishment at international human rights court.

articles.title: GIs Should Be Driven out of S. Korea: Spokesman for Nationwide Special Committee on GIs' Crimes
articles.content:
GIs Should Be Driven out of S. Korea: Spokesman for Nationwide Special Committee on GIs' Crimes
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- In south Korea the pro-American traitors recently launched such burlesque as "ceremony" marking the centenary of founding of the U.S. army 2nd division stationed there, only to be cursed and censured by the public.
					 The farce which began with a "celebration concert" on June 10 will reportedly last until October 26 when the 2nd Division was founded, expecting various "events" including ex-GIs' tour of south Korea and a ceremony of unveiling a sculpture symbolic of "south Korea-U.S. friendship".
					
					 A spokesman for the North-side Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes in a statement on Saturday terms the "ceremony" and behavior of the south Korean authorities patronizing it a treacherous act out of the bad habit of kowtowing to the U.S. and inveterate idea of submission to big powers, and an unpardonable reckless act going against history and the trend of the times oriented to independence.
					
					 The statement says:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression troops in south Korea are a horde of gangsters and brutes who have perpetrated all sorts of crimes such as murder, plunder, theft and rape for more than 7 decades in south Korea.
					
					 Nevertheless, the pro-U.S. elements gave a "congratulatory concert" for the GIs murderers, spending money collected as taxes from south Koreans. This is just an act of treachery and a shameless deed of disregarding the nation's indignation at the U.S.
					
					 As long as the U.S. imperialists occupy south Korea and the traitors existing on sycophancy toward the U.S. are allowed to run wild, south Koreans can never escape from sustained sufferings, misfortune and disaster.
					
					 The way to end this disgrace and distress and retrieve dignity and sovereignty of the nation is to drive the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, the source of all misfortune and disasters, out of south Korea.
					
					 People of various circles in south Korea should wage a stronger massive struggle to get the GIs withdrawn from south Korea, piercing the true colors and nature of the U.S. as cruel aggressors, and resolutely disrupt the above-said "ceremony" of the pro-U.S. conservative group.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Immortal Feats for Revolutionary Party Building
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Immortal Feats for Revolutionary Party Building
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- It has been 53 years since leader Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on June 19, Juche 53 (1964).
					 On this occasion, the world progressives are highly praising Kim Jong Il for his feats performed in the party building by creating an example of building a revolutionary party.
					
					 What is important in his feats for the party building is that he provided the fundamental guidelines on building the revolutionary party.
					
					 He made public his famous work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" in October Juche 81 (1992) when the world socialist cause was in hard time.
					
					 In the work, he made clear that in order to accomplish the socialist cause, it is important to firmly defend the purity of the socialist ideology and settle the issue of succession to the leadership in a right way and, to this end, the party should be strengthened.
					
					 After its publication, the work received full support from the progressive parties of the world as the "textbook on building a revolutionary party in the era of independence" and "beacon light to the world socialist movement".
					
					 Kim Jong Il also authored such famous works as "Abuses of Socialism are Intolerable", "Socialism is a Science" and "Giving Priority to Ideological Work is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" to indicate the ways to rebuild and develop socialism and build and strengthen a revolutionary party.
					
					 Now, his guidelines on building a revolutionary party encourages the progressive mankind in the struggle for defending and advancing the socialist cause, the popular masses' cause of independence, while displaying its validity and vitality.
					
					 Therefore, diverse events like seminar, lecture meeting and celebration have taken place in different pars of the world to mark the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK in praise of his feats for the world socialist movement.

articles.title: Korean-style Socialism Advancing with Strong Juche Character and National Character
articles.content:
Korean-style Socialism Advancing with Strong Juche Character and National Character
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- It has been twenty years since leader Kim Jong Il made public the famous work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" on June 19, Juche 86 (1997).
					 The work clarifies the principled requirements for preserving the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction, the essential nature and advantages of the Korean-style socialism strong in the Juche character and national character and the guidelines to be adhered to in the struggle for the independent development of the country and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 Since its publication, the Workers' Party of Korea has advanced the cause of socialism along the road of victory, always giving fullest play to the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction.
					
					 It came to be an invincible treasured sword for preserving and defending the Juche character and national character that Kim Jong Il had pursued the unique Songun (military-first) politics and set forth a new line of economic construction with the main stress on the defence industry at the time when the U.S.-led imperialist reactionaries ran amuck ever before in their moves to stifle and isolate the DPRK.
					
					 The history of his Songun revolutionary leadership was the one of his noble patriotism and love for the Korean nation that witnessed the good qualities of the nation in full bloom with national culture, art and customs encouraged.
					
					 Now the preservation of the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction is developed onto a new higher stage under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 His wise guidance in giving fullest play to the Juche character and national character in the socialist construction finds its concrete expression in a number of monumental edifices symbolic of the times and masterpieces created as required by the new century as well as national characteristics and emotion.
					
					 Under his leadership, the army and people of the DPRK will further demonstrate the superiority and invincible might of the Korean-style socialism strong in the Juche character and national character.

articles.title: DPRK Will React to U.S. Pressure and Sanctions with Toughest Action: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will React to U.S. Pressure and Sanctions with Toughest Action: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article flails the U.S. for getting mad in sanctions and military threat to the DPRK, exasperated by its steady steps for bolstering up the nuclear force.
					 The DPRK's self-reliant deterrent with the nuclear force as a pivot serves as a powerful means to terminate the century-long U.S. hostile policy and nuclear war moves against the DPRK and ensure the lasting peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the region, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. pushed the DPRK to access to nukes, and its tightened sanctions and military pressure will never make the DPRK dismantle its nukes.
					
					 The U.S. persistent sanctions and military pressure will only precipitate its miserable end. No matter how desperately the U.S. tighten the sanctions and military pressure, the DPRK will bring stronger pressure and bitterer suffering to it.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists dare provoke the DPRK, failing to properly understand its military might and strategic position and its army and people's fixed will to settle accounts with the U.S., they will face mercilessly annihilating retaliatory strike.
					
					 The DPRK will keep to the road chosen by it, resolutely meeting the U.S. vicious and desperate challenge by bolstering up its nuclear force.

articles.title: Those Who Insulted Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership Can Never Go Scot-free: Newspapers
articles.content:
Those Who Insulted Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership Can Never Go Scot-free: Newspapers
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Recently KBS, MBN, Yonhap News and other conservative media of south Korea dared insult the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with slandering the 8th Conference of the Korean Children's Union as a "showy event for maintaining power".
					 This reckless action has come under fire of leading newspapers of the DPRK.
					
					 Such mudslinging, an unethical and treacherous evil deed, can be let out by only hack writers hell-bent on confrontation with the compatriots, Rodong Sinmun says in a commentary Saturday, adding:
					
					 The despicable act of south Korean conservative media is just an unpardonable hideous provocation to the dignified supreme leadership of the DPRK, and an intolerable insult and mockery of its children who are growing up under the care of the peerlessly great man with nothing to envy in the world.
					
					 The situation clearly shows that the confrontation hysteria of the conservative group and hack writers seeking to reduce even children to scapegoats for their conspiratorial racket against the DPRK has reached an extreme phase.
					
					 As the most advantageous socialist system, the most dignified life and the strongest national power precisely mean the dignity of the supreme leadership, the army and people of the DPRK will never pardon those daring hurt it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should promptly investigate the hideous provocation made by conservative media and take a step to heavily punish those behind it at once.
					
					 The heinous criminals daring challenge the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership can never go scot-free.
					
					 Minju Joson says the conservative media and reptile journalists will be forced to pay dearly for their evil deed.

articles.title: DPRK's Decision Was Entirely Just: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's Decision Was Entirely Just: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. military moves against Syria are getting more outrageous on a daily basis.
					 The U.S. startled the world by launching a missile strike on an air-force base of the Syrian government army in April last. It again launched an air strike at the country's military position on June 6 under the pretext that it intruded into the "de-confliction" zone.
					
					 This was a brutal state-sponsored terrorism aimed at toppling the anti-U.S. government in Syria.
					
					 No matter what bizarre excuse the U.S. uses to justify its strike on Syria, it cannot cover up its criminal nature.
					
					 The U.S. has long maneuvered to topple down the current anti-U.S. Syrian government and install a pro-U.S. regime.
					
					 It left no stone unturned in its attempts to incite its internal dissention to topple the Syrian state as part of its strategy to dominate the Middle East.
					
					 As the situation in the Middle East including Syria got deteriorated after the emergence of such international terrorist organization dubbed "Islamic State", the U.S. took it as good chance and launched full-scale military invasion under the pretext of "anti-terror operation."
					
					 The U.S. unilaterally set the "de-confliction" zone in Syrian territory and launched an air strike against the just anti-terror acts of the government forces as "intrusions," considering its territory as its own without its approval. This clearly shows that the U.S. ambition to topple the government has gone to extreme phase.
					
					 The U.S. military acts against the Syrian government provide living testimony to the aggressive nature of its "war on terrorism".
					
					 The "anti-terror war" started by the U.S. clamoring about revenge for the 9/11 incident was a new variant of war of aggression aimed at dominating the world by clearing the countries of anti-imperialist independence from the earth, citing them as chieftains of "terrorism".
					
					 The U.S. is busy striking the Syrian government forces under the name of routing terrorists by applying "anti-terror operation" and keen on backing up "Islamic State," talking about support for anti-terror forces.
					
					 Due to state-sponsored terrorism of the U.S., a stumbling block is lying in the way of activities of the Syrian government for territorial integrity and guiltless people are mercilessly killed in Iraq and other parts of the world by Yankees' bombs and missiles.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are a wrecker of global peace and security and a kingpin of international terrorism. As long as they remain on the earth, their state-sponsored terrorism to bring down other countries and nations will continue without letup.
					
					 Today's reality once again proves that the DPRK's decision was entirely just because it has rapidly built up its nuclear force believing it as the best choice to counter the U.S. imperialists with only strong power.
					
					 The DPRK's army and people will further beef up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense both in quality and quantity to counter the U.S. ever-more undisguised war moves.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Demand Repatriation of DPRK Women Citizens
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Demand Repatriation of DPRK Women Citizens
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- More than 30 organizations of south Korea including the Human Rights Centre of the Council of Christian Churches held a press conference in Seoul on June 14 in demand of unconditional repatriation of women citizens of the DPRK, according to Yonhap News.
					 Speakers at the press conference noted that the demand for the repatriation of Kim Ryon Hui and 12 women citizens of the DPRK detained in south Korea is growing stronger among the people of different social strata.
					
					 They called for strict probe into the truth behind the group abduction of women citizens and punishment of those responsible for the case.
					
					 They urged the "government" to strive for their immediate repatriation.

articles.title: Koreans in China Slam Hostile Forces for Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
articles.content:
Koreans in China Slam Hostile Forces for Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on June 10 in denunciation of the UN "sanctions resolution" on the DPRK.
					 The statement noted that the UNSC on June 3 cooked up again the "sanctions resolution", pulling up the DPRK over its rocket test-fire for nuclear buildup.
					
					 The hostile forces should not make rash act, clearly mindful that their frantic attempt to check the remarkable development of the DPRK's nuclear force would prove counter-productive, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced in Germany
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on June 7 posted on its website "News of field guidance" the full text of "Let KCU Members Become True Sons and Daughters, Young Revolutionaries, of the Socialist Country", a speech made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 It also carried photos of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- An Ethiopian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Addis Ababa on June 13.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew Cherinet, co-chairman of the African Regional Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from June 20 to July 11 and decided to organize such events as remembrance meeting, seminar and photo exhibition in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of the President in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party-building Feats Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party-building Feats Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in the Czech Republic and Germany and round-table talks in Indonesia on June 7 and 8 to mark the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Those events were attended by personages of different social standings and citizens.
					
					 The chairman of the Plzen Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia of the Czech Republic said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, eternal head of the WPK, is a great man who set a brilliant example for the building of revolutionary party.
					
					 His start of work at the WPK Central Committee was a historic event that made the country dynamically advance the socialist cause under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 Praising Kim Jong Il for having strengthened the WPK into the party of the leader and an invincible revolutionary party, the chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said:
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the WPK could always emerge victorious, invariably defending the banner of socialism under the tempest of history and resolutely meeting all sorts of challenges from the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 The chairman and the secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia said that Kim Jong Il was a brilliant model of prominent statesman as he built the WPK into an ever-victorious and iron-willed party.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de la base ganadera en zona de Sepho
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de la base ganadera en zona de Sepho
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno el estado de construccion de la base ganadera en la zona de Sepho.
					  El recorrio la fabrica de procesamiento de carne de Phyonggang, la granja vacuna Aeguk y otros lugares estimulando a los miembros de la Brigada de Construccion 922 que edifican magnificamente la base ganadera.
					
					  En la reunion de consulta convocada en el terreno, se discutieron el problema de producir y suministrar a tiempo los equipos y materiales necesarios, el de formar a los tecnicos y obreros calificados y el de elevar el nivel de mecanizacion y otros remedios para la administracion y operacion normal de la base.
					
					  Por otra parte, el premier visito la almaciga de la provincia de Kangwon, el lugar de construccion del combinado de instrumentos de pesca y otros donde instruyo a los funcionarios y trabajadores locales seguir marchando al frente de la lucha por glorificar la Conferencia de Precursores de Mallima con la dignidad de creadores del espiritu de la provincia de Kangwon.

articles.title: EE.UU. y el Occidente son culpables del problema de refugiados: apunta carta blanca
articles.content:
EE.UU. y el Occidente son culpables del problema de refugiados: apunta carta blanca
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 20 de junio, Dia Mundial de Refugiados, el Instituto de DDHH de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales de la RPDC hizo publica este sabado una carta blanca que revela la causa de generacion y agravacion del problema de refugiados mas grande de la historia.
					Hoy dia, el numero de refugiados sobrepasa 65 millones en escala internacional, comienza el documento y continua:
					
					La aparicion de ellos y el aseguramiento de sus derechos son uno de los mas serios problemas que enfrenta la sociedad internacional en la esfera socio-politica y humanitaria.
					
					La causa del incidente de refugiados sin precedentes reside en la politica exterior de caracter agresivo y rapaz de EE.UU. y los paises occidentales.
					
					Todas las politicas exteriores de ellos se caracterizan por el modo de pensar imperialista consistente en despreciar y reprimir a otras naciones y satisfacer sus intereses sacrificando a otros, la "logica de fuerza" igual a la ley de selva que persigue dominar a todos los paises y naciones del mundo y la concepcion del valor basada en el oro todopoderoso.
					
					Debido a esas politicas reaccionarias, se viola por doquier del mundo la soberania de los Estados, se crean el extremado disturbio politico y desorden y se infringen flagrantemente los derechos humanos.
					
					El incidente de refugiados, que en los albores del nuevo siglo, siembra en la humanidad gran inquietud y crisis, es el producto inevitable de la "guerra antiterrorista" que el imperio americano expande a todo el mundo en complicidad de los paises occidentales presentandola como una de sus importantes politicas exteriores.
					
					Esta claro que mientras persista la agresiva y saqueadora "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. encaminada a tomar la hegemonia mundial, se incrementara el numero de los refugiados en los paises y regiones, blancos de la misma contienda.
					
					Ademas, el incidente de refugiados esta relacionado directamente con la "revolucion de color" que promueven EE.UU. y el Occidente.
					
					La "revolucion de color" constituye una de las principales politicas exteriores de ellos cuyo objetivo radica en subyugar y colonizar a todos los paises y naciones bajo el vistoso rotulo de "libertad" y "democracia".
					
					Debido a la penetracion de la idea y cultura reaccionarias de EE.UU. y los paises occidentales y su ayuda financiera a las fuerzas antigubernamentales, se produjeron en varios paises de Europa Oriental y Asia la "revolucion de rosa", la "de naranja" y la "de tulipan".
					
					 Como resultado, se cambiaron los poderes y se desataron conflictos y sediciones que produjeron el exodo de emigrantes.
					
					 Los violadores flagrantes de DDHH de los refugiados son precisamente EE.UU. y los paises occidentales.
					
					Recientemente, la administracion norteamericana publico la orden ejecutiva de inmigracion que prohibe la entrada en el pais de los refugiados durante 120 dias y estipula el tratamiento discriminado a los musulmanes del Medio Oriente y Africa.
					
					 En virtud de ella, muchos refugiados africanos fueron devueltos por la fuerza a los paises de origen siendo encadenados como criminales.
					
					 Los paises occidentales tambien se quitaron la mascara de "caballeros de DDHH".
					
					Bloquean las fronteras extendiendo la doble y triple alambrada de puas para impedir la entrada de refugiados y devuelven a los que no pudieron pasar la pauta de evaluacion de inmigracion.
					
					  Para colmo, algunos paises encierran a los inmigrantes en los contenedores de carga durante la tramitacion y aplican la ley de no liberarlos como si fueran delincuentes en el caso de que ellos no decidan cambiar el destino a otros paises.
					
					  El bloqueo de fronteras y el acoso intencional crean la situacion inhumanitaria en que un gran contingente de refugiados se encuentra embotellado en las zonas fronterizas viviendo a la intemperie.
					
					  Sin eludir su responsabilidad, EE.UU. y el Occidente deben someterse al castigo merecido en el tribunal internacional de DDHH.

articles.title: Jonminthukwi condena la farsa proyanqui de traidores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Jonminthukwi condena la farsa proyanqui de traidores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los traidores vendepatrias proyanquis realizan las "celebraciones" del centenario de la fundacion de la 2a division de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, lo cual produce las condenas de los habitantes de distintos sectores.
					Dicen que esa farsa comienza con el "concierto conmemorativo" del 10 de junio pasado, preve el turismo al Sur de Corea de los militares norteamericanos retirados, la ceremonia de descubrimiento de obra plastica simbolo de la "amistad Sur de Corea-EE.UU." y otros actos y continuara hasta el 26 de octubre, dia de fundacion de la 2a division yanqui.
					
					El portavoz de la Direccion Nortena del Comite Pannacional de Averiguacion Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crimenes de Tropas Norteamericanas (Jonminthukwi) publico el 17 una declaracion calificando las "celebraciones" auspiciadas por la banda de conservadores proyanquis y el amparo a las mismas de las autoridades surcoreanas de actos traidores a la nacion, que parten del espiritu proyanqui y del servilismo a grandes potencias, y de locura imperdonable contra la corriente de la historia y la epoca actual hacia la independencia.
					
					Las tropas yanquis son la banda de bandidos y bestias que han venido cometiendo todos los crimenes como asesinato, saqueo, robo y violacion sexual ocupando el Sur de Corea durante mas de 70 anos, recordo el documento y prosiguio:
					
					Sin embargo, los elementos proyanquis organizaron la "funcion de felicitacion" para esos asesinos malgastando los impuestos recaudados al pueblo como sanguijuela.
					
					Este acto traidor lo pueden cometer los tipejos que no saben sentir la indignacion nacional ni la verguenza.
					
					Mientras persista la presencia militar norteamericana y actuen libremente los vendepatrias que mantienen su vida con el servilismo a EE.UU., continuaran sin parar los sufrimientos, desgracias y calamidades de los surcoreanos.
					
					El remedio para acabar con tal agravio y martirio y rescatar la dignidad y soberania de la nacion reside en expulsar del Sur de Corea a las tropas norteamericanas, causa de desgracias y desastres.
					
					La poblacion surcoreana de distintos estratos debe dinamizar la lucha masiva por expulsar a las fuerzas norteamericanas al distinguir bien la naturaleza agresiva y bestial de EE.UU. que habla tanto de la "alianza establecida con sangre" y "pais amistoso".
					
					En particular, tiene que frenar y frustrar rotundamente las "celebraciones" mencionadas que promueven los conservadores proyanquis.

articles.title: ACNC condena en comentario las acciones militares de EE.UU. contra Siria
articles.content:
ACNC condena en comentario las acciones militares de EE.UU. contra Siria
Pyongyang, 17 de junio (ACNC) -- Se torna mas brutal la campana militar de Estados Unidos contra Siria.
					En abril pasado, el imperio habia consternado a todo el mundo con su ataque de misiles contra una base aerea de las fuerzas gubernamentales de Siria.
					
					El 6 de junio, volvio a atacar una posicion de las fuerzas gubernamentales de ese pais bajo el pretexto de que ellas invadieron la "zona de amortiguacion de tension".
